react.components.AgendaExportModal.distr: Fields with options: display one value per column
react.components.AgendaExportModal.filte: Drag and drop filters to adjust order
react.components.AgendaExportModal.gcalS: In the left section, open "Other Calendars > Add by URL".
Follow the instructions by pasting the link you copied in step 1
react.components.AgendaExportModal.instr: Copy the link in the field above and open {link}
react.components.AgendaExportModal.login: Please log in to access the export link directly from this menu
react.components.AgendaExportModal.needA: The use of the API requires authentication.
react.components.AgendaExportModal.openD: The content of this agenda can be used following the <link>Open Data</link> principle
This content comes from the agenda {agenda} on OpenAgenda and can be used following the <linkOpendata>Open Data</linkOpendata> principle.
react.components.AgendaExportModal.openI: Open events on the same page
react.components.AgendaExportModal.outlo: At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon
In the navigation pane, select "Add calendar"
Paste the URL you copied in step 1. Select "Import".
react.components.AgendaExportModal.title: Export
react.components.AgendaExportModal.viewE: See all options on the documentation
